mapper.select: SELECT A.CONTENTNO , A.FORMTYPE , CASE WHEN A.FORMTYPE = 1 THEN 'EMAIL' WHEN A.FORMTYPE = 2 THEN 'SMS/LMS' WHEN A.FORMTYPE = 3 THEN 'MMS' END FORMTYPE_ , A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.PURP , A.SITEID, A.ISDELETE , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.REGUSER) AS REGUSER_ , DATE_FORMAT(A.EDTDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EDTDATE_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.EDTUSER) AS EDTUSER_ , USECNT FROM sys990050 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.FORMTYPE = #{formtype} AND A.MENUTYPE = #{menutype} ORDER BY USECNT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.CONTENTNO , A.FORMTYPE , A.MENUTYPE , CASE WHEN A.MENUTYPE = 1 THEN 'VOC' WHEN A.MENUTYPE = 2 THEN '캠페인' END AS MENUTYPE_ , CASE WHEN A.FORMTYPE = 1 THEN 'EMAIL' WHEN A.FORMTYPE = 2 THEN 'SMS/LMS' WHEN A.FORMTYPE = 3 THEN 'MMS' END AS FORMTYPE_ , A.MENUTYPE , A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.PURP , A.SITEID, A.ISDELETE , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.REGUSER) AS REGUSER_ , DATE_FORMAT(A.EDTDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EDTDATE_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.EDTUSER) AS EDTUSER_ FROM sys990050 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.CONTENTNO = #{contentno}
